client_id.title: Client ID
client_id.description: The Azure AD application (client) ID for accessing Office 365 Calendar API

client_secret.title: Client Secret
client_secret.description: The Azure AD application client secret for authentication

tenant_id.title: Tenant ID
tenant_id.description: The Azure AD tenant ID where your Office 365 calendars are hosted

calendar_ids.title: Calendar IDs
calendar_ids.description: A list of specific Calendar IDs to sync (default: all accessible calendars). If not provided, the connector will attempt to sync all accessible calendars. You can find Calendar IDs in the Microsoft Graph Explorer or through the Graph API.

domain_wide_delegation.title: Enable Domain-wide Delegation
domain_wide_delegation.description: This mode allows the application to access calendars across the entire organization using application permissions. The Azure AD application must be configured with appropriate Calendar.Read.All permissions and admin consent must be granted.

events_max_results.title: Events Max Results
events_max_results.description: Maximum number of events returned on one result page. The number of events in the resulting page may be less than this value, or none at all, even if there are more events matching the query. Incomplete pages can be detected by pagination tokens in the response.

cutoff_days.title: Cutoff Days
cutoff_days.description: Fetch events created within the specified number of days
